delete.description: Deletes a role instance from a cloud service.

get.description: Gets a role instance from a cloud service.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: The expand expression to apply to the operation.

get.description: Gets the status of a role instance from a cloud service.
Gets a list of all role instances in a cloud service.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: The expand expression to apply to the operation.

post.description: Restarts a role instance in a cloud service.
Reimages a specific role instance in a cloud service.
Allows you to rebuild all the disks in a cloud service.

get.description: Gets a remote desktop file for a role instance in a cloud service.
Gets a role from a cloud service.
Gets a list of all roles in a cloud service.

put.description: Create or update a cloud service.

get.description: Display information about a cloud service.
Gets the status of a cloud service.

Gets a list of all cloud services in the subscription, regardless of the associated resource group. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of Cloud Services. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the Cloud Services.
Gets a list of all cloud services under a resource group.

post.description: Power off the cloud service. Note that resources are still attached and you are getting charged for the resources.
Restarts one or more role instances in a cloud service.
Reimages one or more role instances in a cloud service.
Rebuilds all the disks in the role instances in a cloud service.
Deletes role instances in a cloud service.

put.description: Updates the role instances in the specified update domain.

get.description: Gets the update domain of a cloud service.
Gets a list of all update domains in a cloud service.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

errordetail.description: The internal error message or exception dump.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

CloudError.description: An error response from the Compute service.

displayStatus.description: The short localizable label for the status.

message.description: The detailed status message, including for alerts and error messages.

CloudServiceRoleSku.description: Describes the role sku in the cloud service.

capacity.description: Specifies the number of role instances in the cloud service.

CloudServiceVaultCertificate.description: Describes a single certificate reference in a Key Vault, and where the certificate should reside on the VM.

certificateUrl.description: This is the URL of a certificate that has been uploaded to Key Vault as a secret.

CloudServiceVaultSecretGroup.description: Describes a set of certificates which are all in the same Key Vault.

sourceVault.description: The relative URL of the Key Vault containing all of the certificates in VaultCertificates.

vaultCertificates.description: The list of key vault references in SourceVault which contain certificates.

CloudServiceNetworkProfile.description: Network Profile for the cloud service.

autoUpgradeMinorVersion.description: Explicitly specify whether CRP can automatically upgrade typeHandlerVersion to higher minor versions when they become available

protectedSettings.description: Protected settings for the extension which are encrypted before sent to the VM

forceUpdateTag.description:
Tag to force apply the provided public and protected settings.
Changing the tag value allows for re-running the extension without changing any of the public or protected settings.
If forceUpdateTag is not changed, updates to public or protected settings would still be applied by the handler.
If neither forceUpdateTag nor any of public or protected settings change, extension would flow to the VM with the same sequence-number, and
it is up to handler implementation whether to re-run it or not

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

count.description: Number of instances having this status code

CloudServiceInstanceView.description: InstanceView of CloudService as a whole

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
